#id=1
#text=The Long Awaited Bath I had been outside working in my garden all day .
#id=2
#text=It was warm and humid outside so besides being caked in dirt , I also had sweated a lot and did not smell very good .
#id=3
#text=I wanted to get everything done in one day so I had worked very hard for a very long time .
#id=4

#text=However , when I went inside to clean up , I realized from an automated message in my voice mail that the water had been shut off temporarily for emergency repairs , it would be on again in a few hours .
#id=5
#text=I was frustrated , but I decided that I was hungry as well so I made myself a sandwich and cut up some fruit to eat .
#id=6
#text=I took off my dirty clothes and put them in the hamper and put on a clean t-shirt and shorts and then put down an old blanket on my couch before I sat on it so I would not get it dirty .
#id=7
#text=I watched part of a baseball game until I could not stand my own stench any more .
#id=8
#text=I went to try the water in my bath tub and was extremely glad when it worked .
#id=9
#text=I ran myself a hot bath and put some bubble bath soap in it .
#text=I got in and found it very relaxing .
#text=I was so glad to finally take a bath , get cleaned up , and relax after a long , hard , productive day .
